text: can we move workflows from one portal to another ?
There's an API endpoint to GET workflows, and to POST workflows, so on paper I guess you could, through the API.

Be wary of the fact, that the API did not return all branches from the workflow sometime ago:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/9881-Operations-Hub/Only-First-Filter-in-If-Then-Branch-from-Workflow-API/td-p/577179>

Not sure if things have changed now. Verify once with a small workflow that has many branches before you commit to taking this route.
Hi <@U01QVR44MEY> same issue its not called still showing the same error message
